short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set price alerts for product pages that you visit. Receive notifications when product price is less than your alert price.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes we really want something but it is just out of our price range. 

LessAlert allows you to set an alert price for product pages you visit. LessAlert will silently monitor the product for price changes. When the product price is less than your alert price LessAlert will show a discreet notification right in your browser.

Clicking on the alert will open up the product page and you can then buy the product that you want for a price that you are happy with.
